::KitKat::

She watched as Drillbit started drilling.  She hoped that they found 
the commander in time.
She turned to Rowdy, "I'm getting a little worried." She had her ears 
flat and her tail down.  She turned and watched the bot work.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, richard f allen <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit turned to Terrorsaur.
> "Ok, then. Beast mode." DrillBit transformed to his beetle mode, 
with
> drill out, and started drilling through the cave.
> "Come on, I need you to tell me where to go."
